name: Grunge Roach Boss
description:
Submission for Trijam #125: The 3 hour game jam

I mostly did it for the challenge of doing another 3 hour game jam and test out a boss scene I want to do for my main slime project.

Check my Twitch stream that I did @migcreatesgames on Twitch

Controls:

W,A,S,D move

Aim with mouse and Left click to shoot

Volume Control click on the setting gear on the top right and X to close
